channel.title: Undo hits both sides of the log at once
channel.description:
#### What happened?
I typed some stuff in the left side of the log. I undid it (now that I know the key on Mac). It undid the left, but also erased the last change I made to the right.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Both sides of the log should be "the log" together for undos, and most recent one should update. Failing that, it should work only on the side your cursor is in.
#### Steps to reproduce:
1) Open log 2) type abc on left 3) type abc on right 4) Hit Ctrl-Z
Expected: right hand abc disappears, left stays Actual: both disappear
#### Comments:
This is with latest .12 patch, but I've seen it previously when all my player numbers disappeared from right, after having done a default log and then undoing a name mistake, and couldn't figure out why.
